title: 5:01 LEAVER BUSTER
body:
Leaver Buster freezes at 5:01 and game does not start. Nor does the wait get recognized!
I have run hextool and ingame system repair trying to rectify this. I have now waited 5 times but still have leaver buster.
Riot did you all quit your jobs becasue faker cried. i mean common this is not good enough. wake up and fix this and my account.. 

Unhappy 
Pinibear
